overview: This one-hour documentary, VENUS UNLEASHED, reveals the intriguing history of plastic surgery and spotlights the most recent breakthroughs in medical science today, that would have been considered as science-fiction fantasy just a few decades ago. Some of the top plastic and cosmetic surgeons in the U.S. were interviewed for VENUS UNLEASHED, who perform today's absolutely astonishing technologically-advanced transformations.
title: Venus Unleashed
